title: ”Wherein?” Malachi’s Message to the Men of To-day
creator: Rev. G. Campbell Morgan
description: LibriVox recording of ”Wherein?” Malachi’s Message to the Men of To-day, by Rev. G. Campbell Morgan. Read by MaryAnn. These studies in the book of Malachi were delivered as addresses to the students at Mr. Moody’s Bible School in Chicago, and then to my own congregation. They have also appeared in “The Record of Christian Work” in the United States, and in “Out and Out” in England. They are now sent out in a more permanent form, after careful revision, with the prayer that they may be used of God in calling His own children into the place of power without which form is nothing. (Introduction by G. Campbell Morgan) For further information, including links to online text, reader information, RSS feeds, CD cover or other formats (if available), please go to the LibriVox catalog page for this recording. For more free audio books or to become a volunteer reader, visit LibriVox.org. M4B format available
subject: librivox; literature; audiobook; devotional; christian; bible
source: Librivox recording of a public-domain text
